translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 血走った目で、魔物将軍は得物の鉄球を握り直す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With bloodshot eyes, the monster general tightened his grip on the iron ball weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ないよ。ほーんとに、からっぽ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nothing. Truly, completely empty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Mランドに逃げ込めばよかったものをな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You should have just fled to M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 虚しく死んでいくか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or die here in vain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何言ってんの。あそこを戦場にしたくないから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What are you talking about? We didn’t want to turn that place into a battlefield,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざここまで来てもらったんでしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we specifically asked you to come all the way here."
"What...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あそこが戦火に見舞われたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that place were struck by the flames of war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 哀しむ人がいるんだよ。だからだめなの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are people who would be saddened. That’s why it’s not allowed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍が得物の鉄球を振り上げたというのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though the general raised his iron ball weapon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 篠田は大事なものを思い起こしたように笑っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shinoda smiled as if recalling something important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まぁいい……ふざけた真似をしてくれたな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... You played your little games!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たっぷりと、あの世で後悔しろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regret it well in the afterlife!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「寝不足で叫ぶと、脳の血管切れるよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you shout with lack of sleep, your brain blood vessels might burst, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「寝不足だと？　それは貴様らが……ぬ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lack of sleep? That’s because you all... huh...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや待て、いちいち叩き起こしてきたのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, wait, the ones who kept waking me up were..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPANの忍者さんに頼んでね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We asked the ninjas from JAPAN, you see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目覚めエモンっていう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s this thing called the 'Wake-up Emon',

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞くと絶対に目覚める銅鑼があるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a gong that, when heard, you absolutely have to wake up to."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラレラレ石で起床の声を録音して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We recorded the wake-up call with a Rare Rare Stone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その銅鑼と併用して。どうだった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and used it together with the gong. How was it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、くだらん小細工を……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, such a trivial trick...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「寝る生き物なら、寝ないのは重要だよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For creatures that sleep, not sleeping is important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間は思考力や集中力が落ちるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans lose thinking power and concentration,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物もそんなに変わらないみたいだね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but monsters aren’t much different either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黙れ！　ベラベラと賢しら口を……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up! Stop babbling arrogantly...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな自慢話を聞いている暇は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t have time to listen to your boasting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで、将軍の表情が変わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the general’s expression changed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍が時間に縛られている事を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had forgotten that the army was constrained by time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 憎い人間の将をついに捕らえた興奮で忘れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: overcome by the excitement of finally capturing the hated human commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……時間稼ぎが狙いか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So delaying for time is the goal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒す気など初めから無く……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You never intended to defeat me from the start..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、死んでくれるならよかったけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, as long as you die, I guess that’s fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまらん真似を。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such a boring act.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それならば、あと一日くらいは粘るべきだったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that’s the case, you should have held out for another day or so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……できたらやってるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I would have if I could."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふう、と篠田は溜息をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shinoda sighed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けれど、今から兵を呼び戻して再編、再出撃。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But even if we call the troops back now, reorganize, and redeploy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでして、Mランドを陥落させられる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can we really manage to capture M Land after all that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山狩りしてたけど、けっこう逃げちゃったんじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ve been hunting in the mountains, but quite a few must have escaped, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度は、将軍が押し黙る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, the general fell silent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな。時間切れかも知れぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right. We might be out of time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが……それでも一日二日は、荒らしてくれるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... even so, we can cause havoc for a day or two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上手くいけば、要人の一人や二人は殺れる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If things go well, we might kill one or two VIPs."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何より、貴様は叩き殺しておいた方が良かろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More than anything, it’d be best to crush you now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は失敗としても、最終的には我らの勝ちよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if this is a failure, ultimately, we will win!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉄球が振り上げられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The iron ball was swung up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいや――人類は、勝つとも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No―― humanity will win."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様らの、好きにはさせん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I won’t let you have your way!"
"Kuh, ugh...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋭く重い剣さばきが、魔物将軍の鉄球を弾く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A sharp and heavy sword stroke parried the monster general’s iron ball.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 返す一刀が、ボディ部分を深々と切り裂いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The returning slash deeply cut through the body part.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「疲労か……動きが鈍い！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fatigue, huh... Your movements are sluggish!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反射的に胴部をかばう動きを気も止めずに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without pause, despite the reflexive movement to protect the torso,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの頭部へのフルスイングが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil’s full swing aimed at the head

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

We might be out of time.\""},{"lineNumber":68715,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが……それでも一日二日は、荒らしてくれるわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... even so, we can cause havoc for a day or two."},{"lineNumber":68716,"originalJapaneseLine":"　上手くいけば、要人の一人や二人は殺れる」","translatedEnglishLine":"If things go well, we might kill one or two VIPs.\""},{"lineNumber":68717,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何より、貴様は叩き殺しておいた方が良かろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More than anything, it’d be best to crush you now."},{"lineNumber":68718,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今回は失敗としても、最終的には我らの勝ちよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even if this is a failure, ultimately, we will win!\""},{"lineNumber":68719,"originalJapaneseLine":"鉄球が振り上げられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The iron ball was swung up."},{"lineNumber":68720,"originalJapaneseLine":"「………………っ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...........\""},{"lineNumber":68721,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいや――人類は、勝つとも」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No―― humanity will win.\""},{"lineNumber":68722,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":68723,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴様らの、好きにはさせん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won’t let you have your way!\""},{"lineNumber":68724,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ、うお…………！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kuh, ugh...!\""},{"lineNumber":68725,"originalJapaneseLine":"鋭く重い剣さばきが、魔物将軍の鉄球を弾く。","translatedEnglishLine":"A sharp and heavy sword stroke parried the monster general’s iron ball."},{"lineNumber":68726,"originalJapaneseLine":"返す一刀が、ボディ部分を深々と切り裂いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The returning slash deeply cut through the body part."},{"lineNumber":68727,"originalJapaneseLine":"「疲労か……動きが鈍い！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fatigue, huh... Your movements are sluggish!\""},{"lineNumber":68728,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...!\""},{"lineNumber":68729,"originalJapaneseLine":"反射的に胴部をかばう動きを気も止めずに、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without pause, despite the reflexive movement to protect the torso,"},{"lineNumber":68730,"originalJapaneseLine":"セシルの頭部へのフルスイングが","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil’s full swing aimed at the head"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 血走った目で、魔物将軍は得物の鉄球を握り直す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With bloodshot eyes, the monster general tightened his grip on the iron ball weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ないよ。ほーんとに、からっぽ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Nothing. Truly, completely empty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「Mランドに逃げ込めばよかったものをな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You should have just fled to M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 虚しく死んでいくか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or die here in vain."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何言ってんの。あそこを戦場にしたくないから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What are you talking about? We didn’t want to turn that place into a battlefield,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざここまで来てもらったんでしょ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so we specifically asked you to come all the way here."
"What...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あそこが戦火に見舞われたら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If that place were struck by the flames of war,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 哀しむ人がいるんだよ。だからだめなの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there are people who would be saddened. That’s why it’s not allowed."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 将軍が得物の鉄球を振り上げたというのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even though the general raised his iron ball weapon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 篠田は大事なものを思い起こしたように笑っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shinoda smiled as if recalling something important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まぁいい……ふざけた真似をしてくれたな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then... You played your little games!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: たっぷりと、あの世で後悔しろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regret it well in the afterlife!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「寝不足で叫ぶと、脳の血管切れるよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you shout with lack of sleep, your brain blood vessels might burst, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「寝不足だと？　それは貴様らが……ぬ……？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lack of sleep? That’s because you all... huh...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや待て、いちいち叩き起こしてきたのは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, wait, the ones who kept waking me up were..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「JAPANの忍者さんに頼んでね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We asked the ninjas from JAPAN, you see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目覚めエモンっていう、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s this thing called the 'Wake-up Emon',

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 聞くと絶対に目覚める銅鑼があるの」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a gong that, when heard, you absolutely have to wake up to."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ラレラレ石で起床の声を録音して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We recorded the wake-up call with a Rare Rare Stone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その銅鑼と併用して。どうだった？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and used it together with the gong. How was it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ッ、くだらん小細工を……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, such a trivial trick...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「寝る生き物なら、寝ないのは重要だよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "For creatures that sleep, not sleeping is important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間は思考力や集中力が落ちるけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humans lose thinking power and concentration,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物もそんなに変わらないみたいだね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but monsters aren’t much different either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「黙れ！　ベラベラと賢しら口を……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Shut up! Stop babbling arrogantly...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな自慢話を聞いている暇は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don’t have time to listen to your boasting..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこで、将軍の表情が変わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the general’s expression changed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍が時間に縛られている事を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He had forgotten that the army was constrained by time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 憎い人間の将をついに捕らえた興奮で忘れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: overcome by the excitement of finally capturing the hated human commander.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……時間稼ぎが狙いか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...So delaying for time is the goal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 倒す気など初めから無く……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You never intended to defeat me from the start..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、死んでくれるならよかったけどね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, as long as you die, I guess that’s fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つまらん真似を。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such a boring act.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それならば、あと一日くらいは粘るべきだったな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that’s the case, you should have held out for another day or so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……できたらやってるよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I would have if I could."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふう、と篠田は溜息をついた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shinoda sighed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けれど、今から兵を呼び戻して再編、再出撃。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But even if we call the troops back now, reorganize, and redeploy,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこまでして、Mランドを陥落させられる？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: can we really manage to capture M Land after all that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山狩りしてたけど、けっこう逃げちゃったんじゃない？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ve been hunting in the mountains, but quite a few must have escaped, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度は、将軍が押し黙る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, the general fell silent.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな。時間切れかも知れぬ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s right. We might be out of time."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが……それでも一日二日は、荒らしてくれるわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But... even so, we can cause havoc for a day or two.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 上手くいけば、要人の一人や二人は殺れる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If things go well, we might kill one or two VIPs."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何より、貴様は叩き殺しておいた方が良かろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More than anything, it’d be best to crush you now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今回は失敗としても、最終的には我らの勝ちよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even if this is a failure, ultimately, we will win!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鉄球が振り上げられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The iron ball was swung up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いいや――人類は、勝つとも」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No―― humanity will win."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貴様らの、好きにはさせん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I won’t let you have your way!"
"Kuh, ugh...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鋭く重い剣さばきが、魔物将軍の鉄球を弾く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A sharp and heavy sword stroke parried the monster general’s iron ball.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 返す一刀が、ボディ部分を深々と切り裂いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The returning slash deeply cut through the body part.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「疲労か……動きが鈍い！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fatigue, huh... Your movements are sluggish!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 反射的に胴部をかばう動きを気も止めずに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Without pause, despite the reflexive movement to protect the torso,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの頭部へのフルスイングが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil’s full swing aimed at the head
